title: PM reviews development projects of GB
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 27 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Monday held a meeting with his Advisor for Kashmir and Gilgit Baltistan Qamar Zaman Kaira and Governor Gilgit Baltistan Syed Mehdi Shah and discussed administrative affairs and development projects of Gilgit Baltistan.The PM assured them of early resolution of issues of Gilgit Baltistan.He said the federal government was making every effort for promotion of tourism in Gilgit Baltistan.He said collective efforts would be made for the welfare and well-being of the people of northern areas.
